description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Caesar Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Caesar Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, process egg yolks, 1 tbs lemon juice, mustard, garlic, anchovy and sauce in a small food processor until combined. With the motor running, gradually add the oil, reserving 1 tbs. Season with salt and pepper and add remaining lemon juice to taste. Cover and chill until needed.
Brush bread with reserved oil. Heat a chargrill pan over medium heat. Cook bread and chorizo, turning until charred on both sides.
Thread chorizo, bread, prawn, lettuce and cherry tomatoes onto skewers. Drizzle with a little of the dressing and season with salt and pepper. Serve remaining dressing on the side.
